short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to import players from your club and solve Ultimate Team Squad Building Challenges or build meta squads using EasySBC

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows EasySBC premium subscribers to import their players from the Ultimate Team Web App to the EasySBC website.

With your players imported you can:
- Find the cheapest solution for any SBC (including all Hybrid SBCs).
- Build meta squads with the AI Squad Builder.
- Track all your evos and see their best evo paths with Meta Ratings.
â€¦ and much more!

Tip: Go to Profile on EasySBC and allow Automatic Import Updates to track changes to your club when you are using the Web App.
